DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Pegylated Interferon Lambda Plus Single 2 Direct Antiviral Agents With Ribavirin
DOC.criteria: Chronic Hepatitis C , Genotype 1 HCV RNA > 100,000 IU/mL screening ; Seronegative Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) ; Liver biopsy within prior 2 year ; subject compensate cirrhosis enroll cap approximately 10 % Any evidence liver disease HCV ; Coinfection HIV ; Diagnosed suspect hepatocellular carcinoma ; Medical history laboratory value abnormality would prohibit use Pegylated Interferon Alpha2a Ribavirin
